description.lang: Dune HD Solo 4K is a hybrid media player / set-top-box with built-in Z-Wave Controller function.The media player / set-top-box part is based on Sigma Designs SMP8758 media processor. It supports the playback of various kind of audio and video content (4K and FullHD video including support for HEVC video codec and 10-bit color encoding, 3D video, high-end audio formats with high resolution up to 24-bit / 192 KHz, IPTV and VOD content, digital TV channels, etc) from various sources (USB storage devices, SATA HDD, local network, Internet).The Z-Wave Controller function is based on Sigma Designs ZM5304 Z-Wave module and Z-Wave Controller software stack "Z-Way" from Z-Wave.Me. It supports controlling various types of Z-Wave devices, provides rich Z-Wave configuration and diagnostics possibilities, provides powerful Home Automation and integration features (including scripting and API).
